summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1378, for the improvement of Blewett Street from Woodlawn Avenue to the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway, and Bagley Avenue, from the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway to Kilbourne Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15108 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
